title: SatAM season3  WHEN EAGLE FALL part1

text_content.excerpt:
The night is dark and cold. The black cloud and fog wandering around in all the corner of Robotropolis .factory¡¦s boiler never stop working.  In the dark strange fog can see many SWATbots eyes and hover craft Like a jack-o'-lantern and vanish in the end of the dark.

description:
Sonic the hedgehog Season3 episode 12 - WHEN EAGLE FALL

written by: AVCHonline

after Sonic and Sally use the power stone to defeat Dr.robotnik , they try to go back to Robotropolis to set everythings right,
but there's something waiting them.....

this is the season3 story i written. have 20 episode , episode1 : new member, and episode 20: Angel of Mobius

but don't have too much time to write every story. so i choose a story that i really like and sumbit it. and....you know i am Taiwanese. english not good enough. so if i have some spelling mistake or sentence not so beautiful. please forgive. thanks and enjoy it ~AVCHonline


also
if you read my story of "Sonic the hedgehog SatAM season3 episode12 : When eagle fall" and listening to Sally's plan but don't get it or think its too complicated to understand. this map you can used , thanks for watching
